extensionDescription.message: Configure which tab to select after closing the current tab.

commandOrderDescription.message: After closing the current tab, try selecting in this order:

closeShortcut.message: Shortcut to close the current tab

bug1366290Mitigation.message: If your browser are affected by Firefox's Bug 1366290 (version 56 or earlier), check this to mitigate it

disableFromNewTab.message: Fix incompatibility with switching to tab from the address bar (requires Firefox 65 or later)

loadCustomNewTabUrlDesc.message: If you are using a custom new tab page, click the following button to apply this fix on it:

shortcutCompatibilityNote.message: Update to Firefox 60 or later for shortcut support.

shortcutsDescription.message: When using these shortcuts to close the current tab, only the corresponding items in the selection order are considered.

exclusionsDescription.message: Prevent the extension from selecting these pages. One address per line.

saveDesc.message: Click outside the text fields to save.
